colleges.name: Princeton University
colleges.description: Princeton boasts a renowned Department of Astrophysical Sciences and houses numerous research centers like the Princeton Institute for Advanced Study.

colleges.name: McGill University
colleges.description: McGill offers a strong astronomy program within its Physics department, featuring access to observatories and collaborations with international partners.

colleges.name: University of Texas at Austin
colleges.description: This Texas powerhouse boasts a top-ranked Astronomy department with active research in areas like gravitational waves and exoplanets. They partner with observatories like McDonald Observatory.

colleges.name: University of Toronto
colleges.description: Toronto's Astronomy & Astrophysics department boasts a diverse research environment with access to major facilities like the David Dunlap Observatory.

colleges.name: Stanford University
colleges.description: Stanford's Department of Physics houses a vibrant astronomy program known for its cutting-edge research in areas like cosmology and galaxy formation.

colleges.name: University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
colleges.description: UCLA's Department of Astronomy offers diverse research opportunities from exoplanet studies to theoretical cosmology, with access to facilities like the Keck Observatory.

colleges.name: University College London (UCL)
colleges.description: Part of the prestigious University of London, UCL's Department of Physics & Astronomy offers robust research across diverse areas, including gravitational physics and astrobiology.

colleges.name: Leiden University
colleges.description: Leiden's Observatory is the oldest in the country and houses a renowned astronomy program with a strong emphasis on observational research.

colleges.name: National Astronomical Observatories of China (NAOC)
colleges.description: NAOC operates multiple observatories and research institutes, offering postgraduate programs in astronomy and related fields.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Astrophysics (IIA)
colleges.description: IIA is a premier research institute offering programs in astrophysics and astronomy, with a focus on areas like solar physics and galactic studies.
